abstract: A federal bankruptcy judge in Chicago on Monday approved a bidding process for the Hartmarx after the company revised a takeover bid to provide more cash for its largest creditor, Wells Fargo.
snippet: A federal bankruptcy judge in Chicago on Monday approved a bidding process for the Hartmarx after the company revised a takeover bid to provide more cash for its largest creditor, Wells Fargo.
lead_paragraph: It looks like a deal to sell the Hartmarx Corporation to a European private equity firm may get off the ground, after all.

headline.main: To Appease Wells Fargo, Hartmarx Sweetens Deal
